original_text: Then he said, ‘The Son of Man will have to suffer in many ways. The important Jews, the leaders of the priests and the teachers of God's Law will turn against him. People will kill him, but three days later God will cause him to become alive again.’
korean_text: 이르시되 인자가 많은 고난을 받고 장로들과 대제사장들과 서기관들에게 버린 바 되어 죽임을 당하고 제삼일에 살아나야 하리라 하시고

sentences.original_text: The Son of Man will have to suffer in many ways
sentences.korean_translation: 인자는 여러 가지로 고난을 받아야 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: and the teachers of God's Law
God will cause him to become alive again
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 그를 다시 살게 하실 것이다
